scripts.build: yarn run build-js && yarn run build-css
scripts.build-css: yarn run copy-css && node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log static/css/**/*.css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata static/js/modules/*.js
